monsters.name: Maid Ghoul
monsters.description: Death took his humanity but not his skill with the knife.

monsters.name: Binding Mummy
monsters.description: What the gods decree, the mummies enforce.

monsters.name: Demoniac Cat
monsters.description: Its last life is spent tormenting your dreams.

monsters.name: Carrion Screecher
monsters.description: The banished have come home to roost.

monsters.name: Corpse Blockade
monsters.description: There are laws against it, but the dead have no one to complain to and the living are too frightened to investigate.

monsters.name: Dreadhorde Butcher
monsters.description: It oozes death from every pore.

monsters.name: Dead Slave
monsters.description: Half a brain rules the mindless.

monsters.name: Lich Lord
monsters.description: Fusing intelligence with the power of undeath requires inspiration of the darkest kind

monsters.name: Vampire Hunter
monsters.description: The relationship between hunter and hunted knows nothing of alliances.

monsters.name: Arrogant Vampire
monsters.description: Charm and grace may hide a foul heart.

monsters.name: Vampire Hexmage
monsters.description: When the blood hunt lost its thrill, she looked for less tangible means of domination.

monsters.name: Vampire Nighthawk
monsters.description: One day, he may be paragons of deadly elegance. For the moment, he possess nothing but thirst.

monsters.name: Vampire Noble
monsters.description: No emergency is so dire that it cannot be dealt with elegantly.

monsters.name: Sutured Ghoul
monsters.description: Ghouls are often found skulking on the fringes of great battles, showing themselves only to snatch the wounded and weak, dragging their victims screaming into the shadows.

monsters.name: Ormendahl, Profane Prince
monsters.description: With Griselbrand gone, the Skirsdag eagerly awaited another demon to claim their devotion. Ormendahl did not make them wait long.

monsters.name: Ravenous Demon
monsters.description: His twisted words entice the weak.

monsters.name: Hellcarver Demon
monsters.description: If we cannot live proudly, we die so!

monsters.name: Illusonary Demon
monsters.description: In the Maelstrom, a trick of the light can feast on human flesh

monsters.name: The Reaper
monsters.description: The World Spell thawed their grave, promising rest in soft, quiet earth at last. But the reaper called them to a twisted cause.

monsters.name: Apocalypse Demon
monsters.description: Pick a shell upon my shore and put it to your ear. That sound isn't the sea, but the whispers of the fallen.
